briefTitle: JASAP: Japanese Aggrenox Stroke Prevention vs. Aspirin Programme
officialTitle: JASAP: Japanese Aggrenox Stroke Prevention vs. Aspirin Programme, Phase III Study to Compare the Preventive Effect of Recurrent Brain Infarction and Safety of Aggrenox (Combination Drug Containing Sustained-release Dipyridamole 200 mg/Acetylsalicylic Acid 25 mg) Twice Daily vs. Acetylsalicylic Acid 81 mg Once Daily
summary: Phase III study to compare the preventive effect of recurrent brain infarction and safety of Aggrenox (combination drug containing sustained-release dipyridamole 200 mg/acetylsalicylic acid 25 mg) twice daily vs. acetylsalicylic acid 81 mg once daily

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Patients With First Recurrent Cerebral Infarction (Fatal or Non-fatal)
